name: What's "Up" in Space?
description:
Please Enjoy What's "Up" In Space!

Final Modifications:

  1. Redesigned Level 1 as a more holistic tutorial  
  2. Redesigned Level 2 completely as a more advanced level
  3. Created Level 3
  4. Created Level 4 (Boss Fight!)
  5. Implemented drop system for the final boss room exit
